Description.Text:
It's a good bet you will see some great Maui sunsets at this oceanfront property. Good sunset views are available from many of the condominiums and from the large, park-like lawn that fronts the property to the ocean. There are two five-story buildings, with elevators, offering one and two bedroom condominiums. You will enjoy the convenience to shopping, restaurants, golf courses, and tennis courts. The Maui Sunset resort is a quiet, expansive property and its amenities include a large swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, barbecues, and a weight room. If you want to wind surf, this is a popular place to launch your rig. The interiors of the condominiums are spacious and well appointed with fully equipped kitchens, satellite TV, telephone, washer/dryer, air conditioning, and private lanais. Ocean and garden views are available for your enjoyment. **Minimum 4-night stay is required or a cleaning fee will be needed at check-out**

September 17: POOL will be closed 7AM to 3PM for cleaning and maintenance repair.

September 25: HOT Tub will be closed for 24 hours.

October 1: Pool will be closed from 7AM to 3PM for touch up/repair maintenance.

Two Bedroom condo - This condominium includes queen bed; twin beds and queen hide a bed sofa. All condominium resorts have a swimming pool and are close to shopping, restaurants, golf, activities and the airport. All resorts have BBQ's. All condominiums have fully equipped kitchens, telephones, color cable TV or complex satellite and private lanais. All condominiums are considered a "home away from home" and the inventory includes microwave, coffee maker, blender, toaster, dishes, glasses, silverware, pots and pans, utensils, baking dishes, towels, lines, iron, vacuum, alarm clock and many other items to make your vacation comfortable and enjoyable. Accommodations are professionally cleaned and prepared for all guests prior to arrival, and include starter supplies of paper products and soaps. Additional supplies are the guest's responsibility. Maid service is available for an additional fee.
One Bedroom condo - This condominium includes one queen bed and a queen hide a bed sofa. All condominium resorts have a swimming pool and are close to shopping, restaurants, golf, activities and the airport. All resorts have BBQ's. All condominiums have fully equipped kitchens, telephones, color cable TV or complex satellite and private lanais. All condominiums are considered a "home away from home" and the inventory includes microwave, coffee maker, blender, toaster, dishes, glasses, silverware, pots and pans, utensils, baking dishes, towels, lines, iron, vacuum, alarm clock and many other items to make your vacation comfortable and enjoyable. Accommodations are professionally cleaned and prepared for all guests prior to arrival, and include starter supplies of paper products and soaps. Additional supplies are the guest's responsibility. Maid service is available for an additional fee.
